thread.title: BRIEF-Intercontinental Exchange Says ICE Benchmark Administration Ltd Is Authorised As Regulated Benchmark Administrator

title: BRIEF-Intercontinental Exchange Says ICE Benchmark Administration Ltd Is Authorised As Regulated Benchmark Administrator

organizations.name: brief-intercontinental exchange says ice benchmark administration ltd

text:
April 30, 2018 / 10:45 AM / Updated 13 minutes ago BRIEF-Intercontinental Exchange Says ICE Benchmark Administration Ltd Is Authorised As Regulated Benchmark Administrator Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
April 30 (Reuters) - Intercontinental Exchange Inc:
* INTERCONTINENTAL EXCHANGE - ICE BENCHMARK ADMINISTRATION LIMITED IS AUTHORISED AS REGULATED BENCHMARK ADMINISTRATOR UNDER EU BENCHMARKS REGULATION
* INTERCONTINENTAL EXCHANGE - AUTHORISATION WAS GRANTED BY UKâ€™S FINANCIAL CONDUCT AUTHORITY ON APRIL 27 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
